original_title: A spicy treat helps negotiate city's streets
article_summary: "Chongqing offers a unique blend of culture and cuisine, with spicy dumplings and a cable car ride across the Yangtze River being must-try experiences. The city's Chongqing Museum showcases the history of the Three Gorges, and Testbed 2, a renovated printing factory, offers a vibrant mix of art, culture, shopping, and dining."</s>
